article:
A trip to Qinhuangdao
In the summer of 2012,I took a trip to Qinhuangdao.It  _  a fantastic trip.
We went there  _  plane,because we wanted to get there quickly.And we arrived  _  there at about eleven o'clock and we had lunch there.We  _  the sea food.It was delicious.The weather was  _  and hot,so we swam in the sea.There were many people  _  the beach that day.
Qinhuangdao is the origin  of the Great Wall,so we  also  visited the Great Wall.The place is  _  and the locals  are really nice.We were there  _  a week.I bought an expensive souvenir.And then,we went home  _ .I really enjoyed my holiday.
I enjoyed the trip.It was really a wonderful trip.
